title: Kami
description: “KAMI” is a collection of poetry written about the relationship between You and KAMI, which is a sort of indissoluble tie. You do not exist without KAMI; KAMI does not exist without you. As you exist, so KAMI exists, and watches your life. However, your own view is very different from KAMI’s view.　 Contents are: Beautiful Moment more than Eternity, Gift from God, Poetry that God gives His creatures, Forest Scene, All Beings and Creatures, Sacred Act, McDonald’s in Heaven, Summer Wind, Proof of Existence, Principle of Causality, Blue Bear, Guardian, Sin and Forgiveness, God’s Dream, Waking at Last Moment, Parting Words, Twilight Breeze, Rebirth...
author: Yoshiki Ashida
